subject: Eight Belles (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Horses
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: The general public cares far less about the economics and far more about Eight Belles. Her public death should resonate in a way that forces reform.
